mapper.select: SELECT u.userPassword, u.userId, a.AuthUser as Auth from user as u inner join UserAuth as ua on u.userIdx = ua.userIdx inner join Auth as a on ua.AuthLevel = a.AuthLevel where u.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( userId, userPassword, userNick, userEmail, userBirth, userSex, userDate ) values ( #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userNick}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth}, #{userSex}, now() )
